DOC.brief_summary: Extensive tumour debulking challenges both surgeon and anaesthesiologist but promotes survival in late-stage ovarian cancer patients. Little is known about the intraoperative fluid balance and its impact on morbidity and mortality.
DOC.brief_title: Fluid Balance During Surgery for Ovarian Cancer
DOC.criteria: patients scheduled for cytoreductive surgery in ovarian cancer Age < 18 years unability to give consent
